categories: Category:Imperial I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Hydra was one of four Imperial I-class Star Destroyers stationed at the Maw Installation as part of Admiral Natasi Daala's squadron.

The Hydra was destroyed when Han Solo - accompanied by Qwi Xux, Chewbacca, and Kyp Durron - flew the Sun Crusher through her control bridge during the group's escape from the Maw Installation. Control of the vessel was lost, and it was pulled into one of the Maw's many black holes, where it was crushed by intense gravitational forces.
